Business Purchase Agreement

This agreement is made on Monday , October 15th .

Between

1 . [Kline Matthew Brooks]167-god , [Brooks Media]568-brooks media , ( the “ Selling Party ”[167-god] ) and

2 . [Georgia Rose Cummings]853-georgia , ( the “ Buying Party ”[853-georgia] )

This Business Purchase Agreement ( this “ Agreement ”[853-georgia] ) is made and entered into on Monday , October 15th , by and between , [Kline Matthew Brooks]167-god , having [[its]167-god principal office of business at [Brooks Media]568-brooks media]2117-its principal office of business at brooks media , 15 [Fifth Avenue]16-fifth avenue [New York]3-new york , [NY]64-ny ( “ Seller ”[396-recitals] ) , on the one hand , and [Georgia Rose Cummings]853-georgia ( “ Buyer ”[853-georgia] ) on the other hand . [Buyer]394-buyer and [Seller]395-seller are collectively referred to as ( the “ Parties ”[396-recitals] ) and are sometimes referred individually as a ( “ Party ”[396-recitals] ) .

[RECITALS]396-recitals :

WHEREAS , [Seller]395-seller is [the owner of [Brooks Media at 15 [Fifth Avenue]16-fifth avenue [New York]3-new york , [NY]64-ny]65-brooks media at 15 fifth avenue new york , ny]395-seller , collectively , the ( “ Business ”[395-seller] ) .

NOW , THEREFORE , for and in consideration of the mutual covenants and benefits derived and to be derived from the Agreement by each Party , and for the other good and valuable consideration , the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged . [Seller]395-seller and [Buyer]394-buyer hereby agree as follows :

Agreement to Sell :
